name: Promo Gate Srl
goal:
Promo Gate is an Italian Company located in the Veneto Region, that supports its clients in the definition of projects aimed at promoting their activities and products within the EU.

The overhall mission is to create Strategies for the internationalization at EU Level.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture and media, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Trade
euInitiatives:
Structural Fundings (ERDF - lINE 3)
Regulation 1308 2013
Regulation 1144 2014 for the Promotion of Acricultural Products, Tourism Initiatives aimed at representing the EU as one unique reference territory for the international travlers.
